vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.31;
father of: Ethan (H0387), Heman (H1968), Calcol (H3633), Darda (H1862)
§ Mahol = "dancing"
father of Heman
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   danza en rueda; (2)   padre de Calcol y Darda, hombres sabios, en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪曷 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "舞蹈"
希幔的父親 (王上 4:31)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛曷 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "舞蹈"
希幔的父亲 (王上 4:31)
